title: Study finds ChatGPT boosts worker productivity for some writing tasks
summary: A new study from researchers at MIT has found that generative AI technology, specifically the chatbot ChatGPT, can increase productivity in white-collar work. The study involved giving tasks to 453 college-educated professionals in various occupations, such as marketers and consultants, and measuring the impact of using ChatGPT on their productivity. The results showed that access to ChatGPT reduced task completion time by 40% and improved output quality by 18%. The researchers believe that generative AI will have a significant effect on white-collar work, but it is still too early to determine whether it will be positive or negative. The study also highlighted the need for further research to understand the broader economic and societal implications of generative AI.
